content: The recent news about the Fukushima I nuclear power plant will likely strengthen the cause of the advocates who want to let our local nuclear power plant's license expire.
translations: ita:Le notizie recenti sulla centrale nucleare Fukushima Dai-ichi faranno probabilmente rafforzare le motivazioni di chi vuo
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Zifre (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
